pkgmetadata.longdescription: Calculate and Plot ICER // The app will calculate the ICER (incremental cost-effectiveness ratio) Rawlins (2012) doi:10.1016/B978-0-7020-4084-9.00044-6 from the mean costs and quality-adjusted life years (QALY) Torrance and Feeny (2009) doi:10.1017/S0266462300008461 for a set of treatment options, and draw the efficiency frontier in the costs-effectiveness plane. The app automatically identifies and excludes dominated and extended-dominated options from the ICER calculation.
